feature.name: 3000-char-final-comments
feature.title: Increase Final Comment Character Limit to 3000
feature.description: Update FinalCommentsModal component to accept up to 3000 characters for final comments (currently 1000), aligning frontend with backend API that already supports this limit

complexity.reasoning: Atomic configuration change - simple character limit updates in one component, no new functionality or logic required, backend already ready, minimal testing scope, can be completed in under 1 hour

businessValue.userImpact: Enables teachers to write more detailed and comprehensive feedback for students by providing 3x more character space, reducing need for workarounds or split comments
